title: USAID: War Puts South Sudan Closer To Humanitarian Disaster
teaser: Secretary of State Kerry is in South Sudan as part of a U.S.-led effort to end its civil war. Steve Inskeep talks to Raj Shah, administrator for USAID, about America's efforts to prevent famine there.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
